frames.name: Wang Fuk Court Fire Incident
sample: The fire at Wang Fuk Court started on November 26, 2025.
A fire broke out at the Wang Fuk Court apartment complex in Tai Po.
The fire in Tai Po District killed at least 36 people and injured 29
The fire initially ignited the green mesh nets covering Block 6 before spreading to polystyrene boards around the windows.
The fire's rapid spread was due to non-fire-resistant nets and flammable foam used in construction.
